description: Carabiner is a community-driven platform for sharing events in the Queer community of Montreal. It's a queer & bipoc initiative. All events are moderated, and we keep no personal data. To edit an event, send us a message. The goal of this platform is to offer an alternative to the Zuckerverse. It is not perfectâ€”but it is a start.

contact.title: About Carabiner
contact.description: Carabiner is a queer community calendar for Montreal. We don't keep any personal data. To change an event, message us. Want to collaborate, suggest a feature, or just say hi? Drop us a line!
